mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T_TERMINAL_LOG ( TERMINAL_ID, TERMINAL_MACHINE, TERMAINAL_APP_VERSION, TERMINAL_APP, TERMINAL_LANGUAGE, TERMINAL_NETTYPE, TERMAINAL_OS_VERSION ) VALUES
( #{item.terminal_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.terminal_machine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.terminal_appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.terminal_app,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.terminal_language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.terminal_netType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.terminal_OSVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
